response.original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 ～奇煉怨霊～
response.overview: This documentary horror series has been collabolated with various genres such as TV personalities, magazines, and news sites, and has over 80 titles in total! This year's video is a special feature on a series of strange and mysterious ghosts! Why did psychic phenomena occur on this day, in this place? The images that unfold based on such backgrounds will be etched as a deeper psychic record.
response.title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video: Bizarre and Refined Grudge Spirits
